abstract: Citigroup‘s exposure to indigestion in the leveraged loan market and turmoil in the subprime mortgage business remains a concern, but problems with the asset-backed commercial paper market seem to be ebbing slightly, analysts at JPMorgan Chase said on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s exposure to indigestion in the leveraged loan market and turmoil in the subprime mortgage business remains a concern, but problems with the asset-backed commercial paper market seem to be ebbing slightly, analysts at JPMorgan Chase said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Citigroup’s L.B.O. Deals Remain a Concern, Analysts Say
